system.description:
The Mastermind (FOUNDER OF THE HIDDEN HAND)
You’re not here out of the goodness of your heart, but raw pragmatism. Frankly, hordes of monsters are liable to ruin your plans for wealth, prestige and power. At least your talent for command has come in useful managing this ragtag band of ‘heroes’.

MAKING YOUR FOUNDER

Stats

You start with this array:
  • Iron 0
  • Glass +1
  • Sulphur -1
  • Mercury +2
  • Blood starts at 0.

Looks

Young and ambitious; portly and arrogant; spindly and scheming.

Names

Sigismund, Mohana, Livonia, Ciannait, Vígi, Kwame, Halim.

Weapon

Choose one:

@UUID[Compendium.pbta-rhapsodyofblood.gear.Item.kps7fFCnN6ivZGKm]{A crossbow}

@UUID[Compendium.pbta-rhapsodyofblood.gear.Item.f5klyPLsKAxHzPiA]{Sharp dagger}

HISTORY

One of the other founders helped you find a wondrous treasure. Give their bloodline 2-pact on you. They say what form the treasure took, you say how it’s liable to taint its owner.

Bloodline Moves

@UUID[Compendium.pbta-rhapsodyofblood.moves.Item.wKRu7FGztXEQVHwH]{A Web of Influence}

@UUID[Compendium.pbta-rhapsodyofblood.moves.Item.pubb5iKXYhnqWQxY]{Avarice}

@UUID[Compendium.pbta-rhapsodyofblood.moves.Item.wnuGmgNKEhp6iq9s]{Bodyguard}

@UUID[Compendium.pbta-rhapsodyofblood.moves.Item.EErpKFFLflZEndDQ]{Experimental Weaponry}

@UUID[Compendium.pbta-rhapsodyofblood.moves.Item.tz6WNSfitBE4DDdI]{Opulence}

 

Shelter Move

@UUID[Compendium.pbta-rhapsodyofblood.moves.Item.gQKd21kub5EzhuTB]{Shelter (Hidden Hand)}

Instructions: You can drag-and-drop into your character sheet any Item you choose and it will automatically be assigned to its correct place. Everything else needs to be copy-pasted or input manually (this includes the background & details and your stats).
